args: This fiend is just like the sugar-loving one\nthat came from the Sweet Retreat,\nwhich means it's after...
It's true! It's not even paying attention\nto us—it's going right for the costume!
▷We'll control the costume and avoid\nthe fiend attacks while you all defeat it!◁
Let's hit it together, Sarisse! Ready...GO!
I called Luca here so he could help with...\nUh, wait. Why are there two fiends?

All right, what the hey is going on here?
Lowen said you were getting your butts
kicked by a fiend, but you clearly just
won in a landslide.
Also, it looks like you're trying to protect\nthat other fiend there? This is all weird.
Unfortunately, the plan is a failure.
Have you got an idea, Laxi?!
Remember the idea we rejected during the\ncommittee meeting? If we put that into\nplay, there won't be any issue.
What are you guys talking about?
Hey, what's everyone whispering about?\nAlso, don't you want to maybe move away\nfrom that fiend a bit?
...Looks like everyone is good.\nLet's do this!
Everyone is being controlled by this fiend!
We're going to end up attacking you!
So THAT'S why you were protecting it!
I can't believe he's falling for this...\nHe really is a total dumdum.

Don't just stand there marveling at him!
We have to play our role! ...Please help,
Luca! Defeat this terrible fiend and free us
from its sway!
All right, just leave it to me!\nEat this, fiend! Haaaaah!
We're good now, everyone! I shot the\nfiend, so it's all going to be...
Apples? Wait, why is it filled with apples?
Laxi?! Where did you come from?!
The apples are a present for you.
▷It's a surprise present, Luca!◁\nJust as you did for Pia, we devised\na prank with a sense of fun to it.
OOOOH! Ha ha ha! I get it now!
Man, I was totally bamboozled there.\nThis is one hell of a prank, I tell you what!
It was thanks to everyone helping us.
Well then, thanks, everybody! It makes me\nsuper happy that you went to all this trouble\nfor me.
...And now, a thank-you party! I made\npie with all of the apples you gave me!
Hmm. The pies look a bit...so-so,\nbut the truth is in the tasting...
I had never heard of Luca being able\nto cook. Of course this was the result.
Well, we can definitely tell how much\ngratitude you put into the pie.
Aw, thanks, Sarisse. Now eat up!
But it's ALSO filled with charred bits and\nburning and grossness, so, uh, pass.
(It's the heat in my heart again—just like\nI felt while we were planning our prank.)
Looks like you're enjoying the party, Laxi.\nI'm glad to see it.
I mean, you're smiling. That usually means\nyou're enjoying something, right?
▷That's right. Plus, I can feel all of\nyour happy emotions.◁

I understand now. The warmth in my
heart...this smile on my face...it's what
having fun feels like. It means I'm
enjoying the party.
I also enjoyed it when we were thinking\nup pranks with the others. It was fun.
Sounds like someone finally gets\nwhat's fun about pranks.
Affirmative. I understand it better.\n▷That's because Luca told us what was\nimportant when it comes to pranking.◁
▷And by working hard to do something\nfun for Luca, we ended up all having a\nbunch of fun ourselves.◁
Seems like you appreciate the true\npleasure of pranks AND parties now!
▷All because of you, Luca! Thanks!◁\nYes. Thank you.
I'm now able to understand the meaning\nbehind Halloween parties. We played a\nprank and everyone enjoyed themselves.
I'll never forget the events of today,\neven after hundreds or thousands of years.
So long as this body and heart continue\nto function, I will remember.
